description: The announcement comes after the total number of confirmed cases in the Republic rose to 223.
title: Coronoavirus: Vulnerable people could need to 'cocoon'
title_page: Coronoavirus: Vulnerable people could need to 'cocoon' - BBC News
maintext: Dr Tony Holohan, chief medical officer, said: "Co-operation across the health service has never been more important and I would like to thank our colleagues in their ongoing efforts to help us to prepare for and limit the spread of Covid-19."
